pages: <!-- begin post --><div class="col-lg-4 col-md-6 mb-30px card-group">    <div class="card h-100">        <div class="maxthumb">            <a href="/talks/2019/02/11/10-51-%D0%B8%D0%BD%D0%B0-%D0%B8%D0%B2%D0%B0%D0%BD%D0%BE%D0%B2%D0%B0-%D0%B4%D1%83%D0%BC%D0%B8%D1%82%D0%B5-%D1%81%D0%B0-%D0%BF%D1%80%D0%B5%D1%83%D0%BF%D0%BE%D1%82%D1%80%D0%B5%D0%B1%D0%B5%D0%BD%D0%B8-%D0%B2-%D0%B8%D0%BC%D0%B5%D1%82%D0%BE-%D0%BD%D0%B0-%D1%85%D0%B8%D0%B3%D0%B8%D0%B5%D0%BD%D0%B0%D1%82%D0%B0-%D1%82%D1%80%D1%8F%D0%B1%D0%B2%D0%B0-%D0%B4%D0%B0-%D1%81%D0%B5-%D0%BF%D0%B8%D1%88%D0%B5-%D0%BF%D0%BE-%D0%BC%D0%B0%D0%BB%D0%BA%D0%BE.html">                 <img class="img-fluid" src="/Uploads/inaivanova.jpg" alt="Ина Иванова: Думите са преупотребени, в името на хигиената трябва да се пише по-малко">             </a>        </div>        <div class="card-body">            <h2 class="card-title"><a class="text-dark" href="/talks/2019/02/11/10-51-%D0%B8%D0%BD%D0%B0-%D0%B8%D0%B2%D0%B0%D0%BD%D0%BE%D0%B2%D0%B0-%D0%B4%D1%83%D0%BC%D0%B8%D1%82%D0%B5-%D1%81%D0%B0-%D0%BF%D1%80%D0%B5%D1%83%D0%BF%D0%BE%D1%82%D1%80%D0%B5%D0%B1%D0%B5%D0%BD%D0%B8-%D0%B2-%D0%B8%D0%BC%D0%B5%D1%82%D0%BE-%D0%BD%D0%B0-%D1%85%D0%B8%D0%B3%D0%B8%D0%B5%D0%BD%D0%B0%D1%82%D0%B0-%D1%82%D1%80%D1%8F%D0%B1%D0%B2%D0%B0-%D0%B4%D0%B0-%D1%81%D0%B5-%D0%BF%D0%B8%D1%88%D0%B5-%D0%BF%D0%BE-%D0%BC%D0%B0%D0%BB%D0%BA%D0%BE.html">Ина Иванова: Думите са преупотребени, в името на хигиената трябва да се пише по-малко</a></h2>            <h4 class="card-text">Днес отново има сепариране, което противопоставя автори с различни естетически, а напоследък и идеологически позиции. Има я обаче и радващата тенденция професионално да се пише и издава литература</h4>        </div>        <div class="card-footer bg-white">            <div class="wrapfooter">                <span class="meta-footer-thumb">                    <span class="postboxcategory">                        <!-- Those categories are one-lined, to avoid unnecessary whitespaces in the HTML -->                        <a class="postboxcat-" href="/category/talks">Разговори за писането</a>                    </span>                    <br />                    <span class="post-date">                                                11                        Февруари                        2019                    </span>                </span>                <div class="clearfix"></div>            </div>        </div>    </div></div><!-- end post -->

<!-- begin post --><div class="col-lg-4 col-md-6 mb-30px card-group">    <div class="card h-100">        <div class="maxthumb">            <a href="/talks/2019/02/08/09-26-%D0%B5%D0%BC%D0%B8%D0%BB-%D0%B0%D0%BD%D0%B4%D1%80%D0%B5%D0%B5%D0%B2-%D0%BD%D0%B0%D0%BB%D0%B8%D1%86%D0%B5-%D0%B5-%D1%81%D0%BC%D0%B0%D0%B7%D0%B2%D0%B0%D1%89%D0%BE-%D0%BC%D0%BD%D0%BE%D0%B3%D0%BE%D0%BE%D0%B1%D1%80%D0%B0%D0%B7%D0%B8%D0%B5-%D0%B8-%D1%81%D0%B2%D1%80%D1%8A%D1%85%D1%81%D0%BB%D0%BE%D0%B2%D0%B5%D1%81%D0%BD%D0%BE%D1%81%D1%82.html">                 <img class="img-fluid" src="/Uploads/emilandreev.jpg" alt="Емил Андреев: Налице е смазващо многообразие и свръхсловесност">             </a>        </div>        <div class="card-body">            <h2 class="card-title"><a class="text-dark" href="/talks/2019/02/08/09-26-%D0%B5%D0%BC%D0%B8%D0%BB-%D0%B0%D0%BD%D0%B4%D1%80%D0%B5%D0%B5%D0%B2-%D0%BD%D0%B0%D0%BB%D0%B8%D1%86%D0%B5-%D0%B5-%D1%81%D0%BC%D0%B0%D0%B7%D0%B2%D0%B0%D1%89%D0%BE-%D0%BC%D0%BD%D0%BE%D0%B3%D0%BE%D0%BE%D0%B1%D1%80%D0%B0%D0%B7%D0%B8%D0%B5-%D0%B8-%D1%81%D0%B2%D1%80%D1%8A%D1%85%D1%81%D0%BB%D0%BE%D0%B2%D0%B5%D1%81%D0%BD%D0%BE%D1%81%D1%82.html">Емил Андреев: Налице е смазващо многообразие и свръхсловесност</a></h2>            <h4 class="card-text">Не е задължително бестселърът да е с ниско качество поради многотиражността си. Ще посоча само: Еко, Маркес, Оз, Роулинг, Мартин, Арчър, Макюън, Гаардер и Уелбек</h4>        </div>        <div class="card-footer bg-white">            <div class="wrapfooter">                <span class="meta-footer-thumb">                    <span class="postboxcategory">                        <!-- Those categories are one-lined, to avoid unnecessary whitespaces in the HTML -->                        <a class="postboxcat-" href="/category/talks">Разговори за писането</a>                    </span>                    <br />                    <span class="post-date">                                                8                        Февруари                        2019                    </span>                </span>                <div class="clearfix"></div>            </div>        </div>    </div></div><!-- end post -->

<!-- begin post --><div class="col-lg-4 col-md-6 mb-30px card-group">    <div class="card h-100">        <div class="maxthumb">            <a href="/interviews/2019/02/07/11-12-%D0%BD%D0%B5%D0%B2%D0%B5%D0%BD%D0%B0-%D0%BC%D0%B8%D1%82%D1%80%D0%BE%D0%BF%D0%BE%D0%BB%D0%B8%D1%82%D1%81%D0%BA%D0%B0-%D0%B7%D0%B0-%D0%BD%D0%BE%D0%B2%D0%B8%D1%8F-%D1%81%D0%B8-%D1%80%D0%BE%D0%BC%D0%B0%D0%BD-%D0%B4%D0%BE%D0%B2%D0%B5%D0%B6%D0%B4%D0%B0%D0%BC-%D0%B3%D0%B5%D1%80%D0%BE%D0%B8%D1%82%D0%B5-%D1%81%D0%B8-%D0%B4%D0%BE-%D1%82%D0%B5%D1%85%D0%BD%D0%B8%D1%8F-%D0%BF%D1%80%D0%B5%D0%B4%D0%B5%D0%BB-%D0%B7%D0%B0-%D0%B4%D0%B0-%D0%B2%D0%B8%D0%B4%D1%8F-%D0%BA%D0%B0%D0%BA-%D1%89%D0%B5-%D1%81%D0%B5-%D1%81%D0%BF%D1%80%D0%B0%D0%B2%D1%8F%D1%82.html">                 <img class="img-fluid" src="/Uploads/nevenamitropolitska.jpg" alt="Невена Митрополитска за новия си роман "Дарът": Довеждам героите си до предел, за да видя как ще се справят">             </a>        </div>        <div class="card-body">            <h2 class="card-title"><a class="text-dark" href="/interviews/2019/02/07/11-12-%D0%BD%D0%B5%D0%B2%D0%B5%D0%BD%D0%B0-%D0%BC%D0%B8%D1%82%D1%80%D0%BE%D0%BF%D0%BE%D0%BB%D0%B8%D1%82%D1%81%D0%BA%D0%B0-%D0%B7%D0%B0-%D0%BD%D0%BE%D0%B2%D0%B8%D1%8F-%D1%81%D0%B8-%D1%80%D0%BE%D0%BC%D0%B0%D0%BD-%D0%B4%D0%BE%D0%B2%D0%B5%D0%B6%D0%B4%D0%B0%D0%BC-%D0%B3%D0%B5%D1%80%D0%BE%D0%B8%D1%82%D0%B5-%D1%81%D0%B8-%D0%B4%D0%BE-%D1%82%D0%B5%D1%85%D0%BD%D0%B8%D1%8F-%D0%BF%D1%80%D0%B5%D0%B4%D0%B5%D0%BB-%D0%B7%D0%B0-%D0%B4%D0%B0-%D0%B2%D0%B8%D0%B4%D1%8F-%D0%BA%D0%B0%D0%BA-%D1%89%D0%B5-%D1%81%D0%B5-%D1%81%D0%BF%D1%80%D0%B0%D0%B2%D1%8F%D1%82.html">Невена Митрополитска за новия си роман "Дарът": Довеждам героите си до предел, за да видя как ще се справят</a></h2>            <h4 class="card-text">Национализмът вече навлиза и в българската литература, като една от формите е в амалгама с ню ейдж течението. Появи се и много добре написан ксенофобски роман</h4>        </div>        <div class="card-footer bg-white">            <div class="wrapfooter">                <span class="meta-footer-thumb">                    <span class="postboxcategory">                        <!-- Those categories are one-lined, to avoid unnecessary whitespaces in the HTML -->                        <a class="postboxcat-" href="/category/interviews">Интервюта</a>                    </span>                    <br />                    <span class="post-date">                                                7                        Февруари                        2019                    </span>                </span>                <div class="clearfix"></div>            </div>        </div>    </div></div><!-- end post -->

разкази </a></h2>            <h4 class="card-text">Деликатен, спретнат, бих казала дори кокетен сборник с кратки разкази, някои от тях истински бижута, които бих наредила до образци на майстори на разказа като Реймънд Карвър и Джон Чийвър...</h4>        </div>        <div class="card-footer bg-white">            <div class="wrapfooter">                <span class="meta-footer-thumb">                    <span class="postboxcategory">                        <!-- Those categories are one-lined, to avoid unnecessary whitespaces in the HTML -->                        <a class="postboxcat-" href="/category/bookreviews">Рецензии</a>                    </span>                    <br />                    <span class="post-date">                                                7                        Февруари                        2019                    </span>                </span>                <div class="clearfix"></div>            </div>        </div>    </div></div><!-- end post -->

<!-- begin post --><div class="col-lg-4 col-md-6 mb-30px card-group">    <div class="card h-100">        <div class="maxthumb">            <a href="/newbooks/2019/02/06/17-29-%D0%B0%D0%B2%D1%82%D0%BE%D1%80%D0%BA%D0%B0%D1%82%D0%B0-%D0%BD%D0%B0-%D0%BA%D1%8A%D1%89%D0%B0%D1%82%D0%B0-%D0%BD%D0%B0-%D1%83%D0%BB%D0%B8%D1%86%D0%B0-%D0%BC%D0%B0%D0%BD%D0%B3%D0%BE-%D0%B5-%D1%82%D0%B0%D0%B7%D0%B3%D0%BE%D0%B4%D0%B8%D1%88%D0%BD%D0%B0%D1%82%D0%B0-%D0%BD%D0%BE%D1%81%D0%B8%D1%82%D0%B5%D0%BB%D0%BA%D0%B0-%D0%BD%D0%B0-%D0%BD%D0%B0%D0%B3%D1%80%D0%B0%D0%B4%D0%B0%D1%82%D0%B0-%D0%BF%D0%B5%D0%BD-%D0%BD%D0%B0%D0%B1%D0%BE%D0%BA%D0%BE%D0%B2.html">                 <img class="img-fluid" src="/Uploads/kyshtatanaulicamango.jpg" alt="Авторката на "Къщата на улица Манго" е тазгодишната носителка на наградата ПЕН/Набоков">             </a>        </div>        <div class="card-body">            <h2 class="card-title"><a class="text-dark" href="/newbooks/2019/02/06/17-29-%D0%B0%D0%B2%D1%82%D0%BE%D1%80%D0%BA%D0%B0%D1%82%D0%B0-%D0%BD%D0%B0-%D0%BA%D1%8A%D1%89%D0%B0%D1%82%D0%B0-%D0%BD%D0%B0-%D1%83%D0%BB%D0%B8%D1%86%D0%B0-%D0%BC%D0%B0%D0%BD%D0%B3%D0%BE-%D0%B5-%D1%82%D0%B0%D0%B7%D0%B3%D0%BE%D0%B4%D0%B8%D1%88%D0%BD%D0%B0%D1%82%D0%B0-%D0%BD%D0%BE%D1%81%D0%B8%D1%82%D0%B5%D0%BB%D0%BA%D0%B0-%D0%BD%D0%B0-%D0%BD%D0%B0%D0%B3%D1%80%D0%B0%D0%B4%D0%B0%D1%82%D0%B0-%D0%BF%D0%B5%D0%BD-%D0%BD%D0%B0%D0%B1%D0%BE%D0%BA%D0%BE%D0%B2.html">Авторката на "Къщата на улица Манго" е тазгодишната носителка на наградата ПЕН/Набоков</a></h2>            <h4 class="card-text">Книгата е издадена на над 20 езика, а у нас я публикува издателство "Лист" в превод на Стефан Русинов. <!-- begin post --><div class="col-lg-4 col-md-6 mb-30px card-group">    <div class="card h-100">        <div class="maxthumb">            <a href="/bookreviews/2019/02/05/12-00-%D1%80%D0%B5%D1%86%D0%B5%D0%BD%D0%B7%D0%B8%D1%8F-%D0%BD%D0%B5%D0%B2%D0%B5%D0%BD%D0%B0-%D0%BC%D0%B8%D1%82%D1%80%D0%BE%D0%BF%D0%BE%D0%BB%D0%B8%D1%82%D1%81%D0%BA%D0%B0-%D0%B0%D0%BD%D0%BD%D0%B0-%D0%B8-%D0%BF%D0%BB%D0%B0%D0%BD%D0%B8%D0%BD%D0%B0%D1%82%D0%B0.html">                 <img class="img-fluid" src="/Uploads/annaiplaninata.jpg" alt="Рецензия: Невена Митрополитска, "Анна и планината" ">             </a>        </div>        <div class="card-body">            <h2 class="card-title"><a class="text-dark" href="/bookreviews/2019/02/05/12-00-%D1%80%D0%B5%D1%86%D0%B5%D0%BD%D0%B7%D0%B8%D1%8F-%D0%BD%D0%B5%D0%B2%D0%B5%D0%BD%D0%B0-%D0%BC%D0%B8%D1%82%D1%80%D0%BE%D0%BF%D0%BE%D0%BB%D0%B8%D1%82%D1%81%D0%BA%D0%B0-%D0%B0%D0%BD%D0%BD%D0%B0-%D0%B8-%D0%BF%D0%BB%D0%B0%D0%BD%D0%B8%D0%BD%D0%B0%D1%82%D0%B0.html">Рецензия: Невена Митрополитска, "Анна и планината" </a></h2>            <h4 class="card-text">Това е почти класически роман за израстването и за 90-те години в България, книга за различните видове зависимости и различните видове избори</h4>        </div>        <div class="card-footer bg-white">            <div class="wrapfooter">                <span class="meta-footer-thumb">                    <span class="postboxcategory">                        <!-- Those categories are one-lined, to avoid unnecessary whitespaces in the HTML -->                        <a class="postboxcat-" href="/category/bookreviews">Рецензии</a>                    </span>                    <br />                    <span class="post-date">                                                5                        Февруари                        2019                    </span>                </span>                <div class="clearfix"></div>            </div>        </div>    </div></div><!-- end post -->

<!-- begin post --><div class="col-lg-4 col-md-6 mb-30px card-group">    <div class="card h-100">        <div class="maxthumb">            <a href="/bookreviews/2019/01/31/14-16-%D1%80%D0%B5%D1%86%D0%B5%D0%BD%D0%B7%D0%B8%D1%8F-%D0%BE%D0%BB%D0%B3%D0%B0-%D1%88%D1%83%D1%80%D0%B1%D0%B0%D0%BD%D0%BE%D0%B2%D0%B0-%D0%B2-%D0%B4%D0%B0%D0%BB%D0%B5%D1%87%D0%BD%D0%BE%D1%82%D0%BE-%D0%BF%D1%8A%D1%82%D1%83%D0%B2%D0%B0%D0%BD%D0%B5.html">                 <img class="img-fluid" src="/Uploads/vdalechnotopatuvane.jpg" alt="Рецензия: Олга Шурбанова, "В далечното пътуване"">             </a>        </div>        <div class="card-body">            <h2 class="card-title"><a class="text-dark" href="/bookreviews/2019/01/31/14-16-%D1%80%D0%B5%D1%86%D0%B5%D0%BD%D0%B7%D0%B8%D1%8F-%D0%BE%D0%BB%D0%B3%D0%B0-%D1%88%D1%83%D1%80%D0%B1%D0%B0%D0%BD%D0%BE%D0%B2%D0%B0-%D0%B2-%D0%B4%D0%B0%D0%BB%D0%B5%D1%87%D0%BD%D0%BE%D1%82%D0%BE-%D0%BF%D1%8A%D1%82%D1%83%D0%B2%D0%B0%D0%BD%D0%B5.html">Рецензия: Олга Шурбанова, "В далечното пътуване"</a></h2>            <h4 class="card-text">Сладкодумната и сравнително кратка фамилна сага ни запознава с предците на писателката, с многобройната й рода от лели, чичовци и братовчеди и с близките семейни приятели</h4>        </div>        <div class="card-footer bg-white">            <div class="wrapfooter">                <span class="meta-footer-thumb">                    <span class="postboxcategory">                        <!-- Those categories are one-lined, to avoid unnecessary whitespaces in the HTML -->                        <a class="postboxcat-" href="/category/bookreviews">Рецензии</a>                    </span>                    <br />                    <span class="post-date">                                                31                        Януари                        2019                    </span>                </span>                <div class="clearfix"></div>            </div>        </div>    </div></div><!-- end post -->
